para.para: HAL module driver. This is the common part of the HAL initialization.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: HAL module driver. This is the common part of the HAL initialization.

literallayout.computeroutput: ============================================================================== ##### How to use this driver ##### ============================================================================== [..] The common HAL driver contains a set of generic and common APIs that can be used by the PPP peripheral drivers and the user to start using the HAL. [..] The HAL contains two APIs' categories: (+) Common HAL APIs (+) Services HAL APIs
